text: James Leo Colby (September 20, 1961 - February 23, 2018) was an American actor. Colby appeared in many Broadway plays and few stage productions in Connecticut. Colby was known for his roles The Pacemaker (1997), Tower Heist (2011), Safe (2012), The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014) and in Patriots Day (2016). In television, he was known for his role as Sergeant Ray Dwyer in Chicago P.D. and Burleson in Empire. Colby died on February 23, 2018 at the age of 56. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Massachusetts
title: James Colby
